GSD.product_version: versions from v4.3 to before v6.0.8
GSD.description:
nfc: s3fwrn5: Fix potential memory leak in s3fwrn5_nci_send()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.8 by commit a53e9ef6f4b1a2fe62e71121cc9c9889cf8bf720, it was introduced in version v4.3 by commit c04c674fadeb4a8e6522fc838d4620f7cfd4c621. For more details please see the references link.
